story_teamflare_01_04000/2401_1101_0100_:
Even though Team Flare caused an incident
forcing their way onstage...
story_teamflare_01_04000/2401_1101_0200_:
the curtains closed without it becoming a
major commotion...
story_teamflare_01_04000/2401_1001_0300_: You had to deal with a lot of trouble, Diantha.
story_teamflare_01_04000/2401_1001_0400_: I can’t believe Team Flare broke in like that!
story_teamflare_01_04000/2401_1001_0600_:
But thanks to a lovely helper jumping in,
I managed to perform through it!
story_teamflare_01_04000/2401_1001_0900_: Do you and Looker know each other?
story_teamflare_01_04000/2401_1001_1100_:
I used to have a detective agency called the
Looker Bureau in Kalos.
story_teamflare_01_04000/2401_1001_1200_:
I had to leave Kalos for my next mission, so I
entrusted the Looker Bureau to Emma.
story_teamflare_01_04000/2401_1001_1300_: I’m the first head of the bureau, and Emma is—
story_teamflare_01_04000/2401_1001_1500_: I still work in Kalos as a detective.
story_teamflare_01_04000/2401_1001_1600_: If you have any problems, leave it to us!
story_teamflare_01_04000/2401_1001_1700_: Sure! Nice to meet you, Emma!
story_teamflare_01_04000/2401_1001_1900_:
I heard Team Flare forced their way onstage
during the performance.
story_teamflare_01_04000/2401_1001_2000_:
Yes, but thanks to Diantha’s quick thinking, there
wasn’t much damage done.
story_teamflare_01_04000/2401_1001_2100_:
Hmm... I wonder why Team Flare appeared
on Pasio.
story_teamflare_01_04000/2401_1001_2200_:
Back in Kalos, I know they were scheming to get
the ancient ultimate weapon working again, but...
story_teamflare_01_04000/2401_1001_2400_:
It’s a terrifying weapon that absorbs the life
from Pokémon...
story_teamflare_01_04000/2401_1001_2600_:
Not only that—that group is good at blending
into society.
story_teamflare_01_04000/2401_1001_2800_: We have to keep our guard up at all times.
story_teamflare_01_04000/2401_1001_2900_: Lysandre’s behind this? No, that can’t be...
story_teamflare_01_04000/2401_1001_3000_: Do you know something about that?
story_teamflare_01_04000/2401_1001_3200_:
He became disillusioned with this world because
people fight over limited resources...
story_teamflare_01_04000/2401_1001_3300_:
And he wanted to rid the world of strife by
reducing the number of human and Pokémon
lives in it.
story_teamflare_01_04000/2401_1001_3400_:
But he also promised here on Pasio that he’d
watch us to see if we could change the world...
story_teamflare_01_04000/2401_1001_3500_: So in the end, he didn’t change his mind?
story_teamflare_01_04000/2401_1001_3600_: No, his beliefs burn strong in his heart.
story_teamflare_01_04000/2401_1001_3700_: It won’t be easy to change his mind.
story_teamflare_01_04000/2401_1001_3900_:
Each person has their own circumstances
and ideals.
story_teamflare_01_04000/2401_1001_4000_:
Sometimes you may need to make an effort to
understand someone else’s way of thinking.
story_teamflare_01_04000/2401_1001_4200_:
Indeed. Even if we couldn’t completely understand
each other, we were getting closer, little by little.
